items.sentence: They don\'t have enough money to buy everything they need.
We need to remember to pick Tom up at the station at 2:30.
When I go to see my grandson, I always give him something.
When I opened the window, I saw children playing baseball.
I asked Tom if he wanted something to eat and he said yes.
Let\'s randomize the order of the images in the slideshow.
Many people think Tom is a snob, but I don\'t think he is.
Mountain climbing isn\'t something I really enjoy so much.
I don\'t play table tennis with Tom as often as I used to.
I don\'t think Tom wants to spend any more time in Boston.
